item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

replace them with …

public void attackGfx(int gfx, int maxDamage) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if(p != null) { client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) { if(person.playerId != playerId) { int damage = misc.random(maxDamage); person.stillgfx(gfx, person.absY, person.absX); if (person.playerLevel[3] - hitDiff < 0) damage = person.playerLevel[3]; person.hitDiff = damage; person.KillerId = playerId; person.updateRequired = true; person.hitUpdateRequired = true; } } } } }

public void IceBarrage() { attackGfx(369, 30); PkingDelay = 15; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; }

item.title: 2 Errors which are bugging me, IDK why this isn't working. Please look
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

Try this…

Declare this

public void attackGroupGfx(int gfx, int maxDamage, int range) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if(p != null) { client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) { if(person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= range && person.playerId != playerId && !person.nonWild()) { int damage = misc.random(maxDamage); person.stillgfx(gfx, person.absY, person.absX); if (person.playerLevel[3] - hitDiff < 0) damage = person.playerLevel[3]; person.hitDiff = damage; person.KillerId = playerId; person.updateRequired = true; person.hitUpdateRequired = true; } } } } }

Then do …

public void IceBarrage() { attackGroupGfx(369, 30, 1); PkingDelay = 15; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; }

item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

public void IceBarrage()
{
int playerIndex = inStream.readSignedWordA();
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerIndex];
hitDiff = misc.random(35);
inCombat();
stillgfx(369, p.absX, p.absY);
PkingDelay = 15;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}

Try that ?

item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

public void IceBarrage()
{
int playerIndex = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
int EnemyX = server.playerHandler.players[playerIndex].absX;
int EnemyY = server.playerHandler.players[playerIndex].absY;
hitDiff = misc.random(35);
inCombat();
stillgfx(369, EnemyX, EnemyY);
PkingDelay = 15;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}

Try that.
